messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] encouragement, was some really long name	before!
messages.msgSnippet: ... Betsy, I personally appreciate all the new things you ve been trying in your kitchen, even though I ve never eaten there.  I think it s great! If nobody
messages.messageBody:
1/4/03 20:27:

> I'm gonna get me one and put it on or near the dinner table the next
> time I try to cook something new. I need more encouragement! I'll take
> fake encouragement if that's all I can get.
>
> While I (sometimes) appreciate honesty, the time may have come to have a
> talk with my son about tact at the dinner table.

Betsy,

I personally appreciate all the new things you've been trying in your
kitchen, even though I've never eaten there. I think it's great!

If nobody ever tried new recipes, there would be no market for cooking
mazagines and cookbooks. Since I like those things, I appreciate anyone
who's working to keep the machinery rolling!

brenda
(how's that? is that good encouragement?)
